requirementsMet.requirement: Use the present tense of querer, dormir, levantar and ir to express simple desires and routines (e.g., "Eu quero dormir", "Você vai para escola").
requirementsMet.evidence: Learner produced single-word verbs 'dormir' and 'levantar' but did not produce any full present-tense sentences or conjugations (e.g., no 'Eu quero dormir' or 'Você vai...').

requirementsMet.requirement: Recognize and produce the affirmative imperative form as used in the chapter ("vai"), including emphatic repetition for encouragement ("vai, vai, vai").
requirementsMet.evidence: No evidence: learner did not produce or respond to imperative forms such as 'vai'.

requirementsMet.requirement: Use the expression "mais um pouco" to request a short extension of time and combine it with verbs (e.g., "Quero dormir mais um pouco").
requirementsMet.evidence: No evidence of 'mais um pouco' in learner output.

requirementsMet.requirement: Comprehend and form simple yes/no questions with "você" and give short answers (e.g., "Você quer?" → "Sim, eu quero / Não, eu não quero").
requirementsMet.evidence: No yes/no question formation or short answers recorded.

requirementsMet.requirement: Understand basic morning- and school-related vocabulary from the chapter: dormir, levantar, escola, mamãe, filho.
requirementsMet.evidence: Learner produced and recognized 'dormir' and 'levantar' but has not demonstrated understanding/production of 'escola', 'mamãe' or 'filho'.

requirementsMet.requirement: Recognize simple nationality/adjective usage in context ("o alemão") and form a short descriptive sentence about someone's origin (e.g., "Axel é alemão").
requirementsMet.evidence: No evidence of nationality/adjective production or recognition in learner output.

goalsInProgress.goal: Role-play a morning routine (parent and child) using present-tense verbs, affirmative commands and "mais um pouco" to negotiate staying in bed or getting up.
goalsInProgress.evidence: Learner correctly produced the vocabulary items 'dormir' and 'levantar' when prompted, showing basic lexical recognition. No role-play, commands, or 'mais um pouco' production yet.

goalsInProgress.goal: Practice the full present-tense conjugation of querer and ir for all persons and use them in simple sentences.
goalsInProgress.evidence: Learner responded with single-word verbs and answered prompts, indicating comprehension of infinitives, but did not produce conjugated forms or full sentences (no 'Eu quero dormir', no 'eu vou').

goalsInProgress.goal: Learn to form basic negative statements and polite requests related to the same context (e.g., "Você não vai", "Por favor, pode dormir mais um pouco?").
goalsInProgress.evidence: Learner shows some vocabulary recognition ('dormir', 'levantar') but has not produced negatives or polite-request structures.

alerts: Core CEFR requirements (present-tense production for querer/ir, imperative 'vai', 'mais um pouco', and yes/no question/answer formation) are currently unmet. Recommend targeted practice before advancing.

Suggested remediation: (1) Prompted production drill: have learner say full sentences such as 'Eu quero dormir' and 'Eu vou para a escola' repeatedly; (2) Conjugation exercise for querer and ir (present tense, all persons) with fill-in-the-blank; (3) Short command practice using 'vai' and emphatic 'vai, vai, vai'; (4) Practice 'mais um pouco' with time phrases ('mais cinco minutos', 'mais um pouco') and short role-play parent/child exchanges.

Related material: short production drills, conjugation worksheets for 'querer' and 'ir', imperative/command flashcards, simple role-play prompts (parent asks, child replies), and example sentences to mimic.
